markdown.markdown:
```{r parameters, include=FALSE}
phase <- "leaf unfolding"
species <- "TC"
```


```{r source, include=FALSE}
location <- paste0(getwd())
source(paste0("../00_helpers/setup.R")) #common libraries and custom functions
source(paste0("../00_helpers/species_and_phases.R"))

lib_residual <- c(
  "nlme",
  "HLMdiag") # influence statistics for lme objects
package_fun(lib_residual, "residuals")
```

```{r load-data, include=FALSE}
model_filter <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/model_filter.rds"))

augment <- readRDS(paste0(path_output_data, "/augment_", species, "_", gsub (" ", "_", phase), ".rds")) %>%
  filter(model_name %in% model_filter) %>%
  mutate(model_name = case_when(model_name == "best_con_1" ~ "best model",
                                model_name == "ref_true_con_int" ~ "traditional model",
                                model_name == "ref_imp_con_int" ~ "refined model",
                                model_name == "parsimonious_con_d2a" ~ "parsimonious 1",
                                model_name == "parsimonious_con_d2b" ~ "parsimonious 2",
                                model_name == "parsimonious_con_d2c" ~ "parsimonious 3",
                                TRUE ~ model_name),
         model_name = factor(model_name, levels = unique(model_name)))
models <- readRDS(paste0(path_output_data, "/models_", species, "_", gsub (" ", "_", phase), ".rds")) %>%
  filter(model_name %in% model_filter) %>%
  mutate(model_name = case_when(model_name == "best_con_1" ~ "best model",
                                model_name == "ref_true_con_int" ~ "traditional model",
                                model_name == "ref_imp_con_int" ~ "refined model",
                                model_name == "parsimonious_con_d2a" ~ "parsimonious 1",
                                model_name == "parsimonious_con_d2b" ~ "parsimonious 2",
                                model_name == "parsimonious_con_d2c" ~ "parsimonious 3",
                                TRUE ~ model_name),
         model_name = factor(model_name, levels = unique(model_name))) %>% 
  select(model_name, model, terms)
```

## Multicollinearity

```{r multicollinearity, results='hide'}
source(paste0(path_helpers, "/HighstatLib.R"))

multicol <- models %>%
  filter(model_name != "model_00") %>%
  mutate(terms = map(model, ~ all.vars(.x$terms)),
         multicollinearity = map2(model, terms, ~ .x$data %>%
                                    select(all_of(.y)) %>%
                                    select_if(is.numeric) %>%
                                    as.data.frame() %>%
                                    corvif() %>%
                                    rownames_to_column(var = "PARAMETER"))) %>%
  select(model_name, multicollinearity) %>%
  unnest(multicollinearity)
```

```{r fig-multicollinearity-table, fig.cap="Variance inflation factors (VIF) of all models."}
ggplot(multicol %>% mutate_if(is.numeric, round, 2), aes(x = PARAMETER, y = GVIF, colour=model_name)) +
  geom_jitter(shape=21, width=0.2, size = 2) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 5, linetype = "dashed", color = "red") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 3, linetype = "dashed", color = "grey") +
  xlab("Term") +
  ylab("GVIF") +
  theme_report(angle=90, legend.position = "right")
```

## Normality

### Residuals

```{r fig-qq-fixed, fig.cap="Quantile quantile plot of residuals of fixed effects."}
ggplot(augment, aes(sample = .resid)) +
  stat_qq(shape=1) +
  stat_qq_line()+
  facet_wrap(~model_name, scales = "fixed") +
  xlab("Theoretical quantiles") +
  ylab("Sample quantiles") +
  theme_report()
```

### Estimated random effects

```{r ranef-extract-fun}
extract_random_effects <- function(model) {
  ranef_data <- ranef(model)
  if (is.list(ranef_data)) {
    # Nested random effects
    map(ranef_data, ~ as.data.frame(.x) %>% rename("Intercept" = 1)) %>%
      bind_rows(.id = "level")
  } else {
    # Simple random effects
    ranef_data %>%
      as.data.frame() %>%
      rename("Intercept" = 1)
  }
}
```

```{r ranef-extract}
random <- models %>%
  mutate(random = map(model, ~ extract_random_effects(.x) %>% as.data.frame())) %>% 
  select(model_name, random) %>% 
  unnest(random) %>%
  mutate(level = case_when(level == "(Intercept)" ~ "METEO_ID",
                           TRUE ~ level))
```

```{r fig-qq-random-meteo, fig.cap="Quantile quantile plot of residuals of random effects for METEO_ID."}
ggplot(random %>% filter(level == "METEO_ID"), aes(sample  = Intercept)) +
  stat_qq(shape=1) +
  stat_qq_line()+
  facet_wrap(~model_name, scales = "free") +
  xlab("Theoretical quantiles") +
  ylab("Sample quantiles") +
  theme_report()
```

## Homoscedasticity

```{r fig-scale-location, fig.cap="Scale-location plot."}
ggplot(augment, mapping = aes(y = sqrt(abs(.resid)), x = .fitted)) +
    geom_point(shape=1, colour="grey") +
    geom_smooth(se=FALSE, method = "loess")+
    facet_wrap(~model_name, scales = "fixed") +
    theme_report()
```

## Expected error

```{r fig-residual-vs-fitted, fig.cap="Residuals vs. fitted plot (Tukey-Ascombe plot)."}
ggplot(augment, aes(x = .fitted, y = .resid)) +
  geom_point(shape=1, colour="grey") +
  geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = 0) +
  geom_smooth(se=FALSE, method = "loess") +
  facet_wrap(~model_name, scales = "fixed") +
  theme_report()
```

## Residuals against predictors

```{r}

fig_fun <- function(PARAMETER) {
  PARAMETER <- sym(PARAMETER)  # Convert character to symbol

  ggplot(data = augment %>% filter(!is.na(!!PARAMETER)), aes(x = !!PARAMETER, y = .resid)) +
    geom_point(shape = 1, colour = "grey") +
    geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = 0) +
    geom_smooth(
      data = augment %>% filter(!is.na(!!PARAMETER) & !is.na(.resid)),
      se = FALSE, method = "loess"
    ) +
    facet_wrap(~model_name, scales = "fixed", drop = FALSE) +
    theme_report()
}

```

```{r fig-residual-vs-predictor-gdd-cons, fig.cap="Residuals vs. predictor variable GDD_conservative."}
fig_fun("GDD_conservative")
```

```{r fig-residual-vs-predictor-drought, fig.cap="Residuals vs. predictor variable CWB."}
fig_fun("DROUGHT")
```

```{r fig-residual-vs-predictor-awc, fig.cap="Residuals vs. predictor variable AWC."}
fig_fun("AWC")
```

```{r fig-residual-vs-predictor-elevation, fig.cap="Residuals vs. predictor variable TREE_ELEVATION."}
fig_fun("TREE_ELEVATION")
```

```{r fig-residual-vs-predictor-slope-aspect-inclination, fig.cap="Residuals vs. predictor variable SLOPE_INCLINATION_DEG."}
fig_fun("SLOPE_INCLINATION_DEG")
```

```{r fig-residual-vs-predictor-slope-aspect-hl, fig.cap="Residuals vs. predictor variable SLOPE_ASPECT_HL."}
fig_fun("SLOPE_ASPECT_HL")
```

```{r fig-residual-vs-predictor-social-situation, fig.cap="Residuals vs. predictor variable SOCIAL_SITUATION."}
fig_fun("SOCIAL_SITUATION")
```

```{r fig-residual-vs-predictor-tree-height, fig.cap="Residuals vs. predictor variable TREE_HEIGHT."}
fig_fun("TREE_HEIGHT")
```

```{r fig-residual-vs-predictor-stand-height, fig.cap="Residuals vs. predictor variable STAND_HEIGHT."}
fig_fun("STAND_HEIGHT")
```

## Temporal correlation

```{r fig-temporal-all, warning=FALSE, fig.cap="Residuals vs. year for each model."}
ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = augment, aes(y = .resid, x = year, group=METEO_ID), shape=1, colour="grey")+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
  geom_smooth(data = augment, aes(y = .resid, x = year, group=METEO_ID), se=FALSE, size=0.5)+
  geom_smooth(data = augment, aes(y = .resid, x = year), se=FALSE, size=1.5, colour="#00008B")+
  facet_wrap(~model_name, scales = "fixed", drop=FALSE)+
  theme_report(angle=90)
```

```{r fig-temporal-site, fig.height=8, warning=FALSE, fig.cap="Residuals vs. year for each model and site."}
ggplot(data = augment, aes(y = .resid, x = year, group=model_name)) +
  geom_point(shape=1, colour="grey")+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
  geom_smooth(se=FALSE, size=0.5)+
  facet_wrap(~ METEO_ID, scales = "fixed", ncol=10, drop = FALSE)+
  theme_report(angle=90)
```

## Influential observations

```{r fig-cooks-distance, fig.cap="Cook's distance."}
cooks <- models %>%
  mutate(cook = map(model, ~ safely(~ cooks.distance(.x) %>% as.data.frame() %>% rename("COOKS_DISTANCE" = '.'))(.x)$result)) %>%
  filter(!map_lgl(cook, is.null)) %>%
  select(model_name, cook) %>%
  unnest(cook)

ggplot(cooks, aes(x = COOKS_DISTANCE, y = 0)) +
  geom_point(shape=1) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 1, linetype="dashed") +
  ylab("")+
  xlab("Cook's distance")+
  facet_wrap(~model_name, scales="fixed")+
  theme(axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_blank())+
  theme_report(angle=90)
```

```{r fig-leverage, fig.cap="Residuals vs. Leverage."}
leverage <- models %>%
  mutate(leverage = map(model, ~ safely(~ leverage(.x) %>% as.data.frame())(.x)$result),
    std_residuals = map(model, ~ safely(~ residuals(.x, type = "normalized") %>% as.data.frame() %>% rename("STD_RESIDUALS" = '.'))(.x)$result)) %>%
  filter(!map_lgl(leverage, is.null)) %>%
  filter(!map_lgl(std_residuals, is.null)) %>%
  select(model_name, leverage, std_residuals) %>% 
  unnest(c(leverage, std_residuals))

ggplot(leverage, aes(x = overall, y = STD_RESIDUALS)) +
  geom_point(shape=21, colour="grey") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", se=FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~model_name, scales = "fixed") +
  labs(x = "Leverage", y = "Standardized Residuals") +
  theme_report(angle=90)
```

# Tilia cordata

```{r source, include=FALSE}
location <- paste0(getwd())
source(paste0("../00_helpers/setup.R")) #common libraries and custom functions
```

```{r load-data, include=FALSE}
  mutate(model_name = case_when(model_name == "best_con_1" ~ "best model",

                                model_name == "parsimonious_con_d2b" ~ "parsimonious 2",
                                model_name == "parsimonious_con_d2c" ~ "parsimonious 3",
                                TRUE ~ model_name),
         model_name = factor(model_name, levels = unique(model_name)))

  mutate(model_name = case_when(model_name == "best_con_1" ~ "best model",

                                model_name == "parsimonious_con_d2a" ~ "parsimonious 1",
                                model_name == "parsimonious_con_d2b" ~ "parsimonious 2",
                                model_name == "parsimonious_con_d2c" ~ "parsimonious 3",
                                TRUE ~ model_name),

  select(model_name, model, terms)
```
